title: Love Unspoken
description: I lent my heart to the bad boy, and he did exactly what I expected he would. He broke it.And the guy I should have been with—he’s still here. He tries to take my mind off everything I’ve lost while showing me what I could have. I’m ready for a new start, to fall in love again … to do what I should have done in the first place.Everything seems perfect.Then the past comes walking back in. I thought I was over him, but one look and I know that’s not true. We went through too much together for those feelings to completely fade away.When my past and present collide, how am I supposed to choose? They both love me, and I love them.A heart will be broken … and it could be mine.
author: Lisa De Jong
